channel.title: B School on Dan's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in B School on Dan's Ramblings

item.title: Why I applied to business school
item.description: Why I applied I’m in my fourth year of being a SWE at Google. It’s a great job. I’ve learned a ton and I’ve met interesting people. But the work feels like work. I’m not particularly passionate about writing software for anonymous enterprises and I now see the job as a means to an end. I see myself doing the minimum to get a passable performance rating and that’s a sign that I need to move on.
